Text: What a treat! Thank You very much for uploading and completing season 2 of my childhood idols.

My pleasure :) It'll be a while before this one starts to download. I'm letting them go one or two at a time and finishing those before starting any more otherwise I'll have a dozen going simultaneously and it'll take ages for any to finish with my bandwidth of only 35kbs.

We'll get there in the end though and then if anyone's interested I have all 30 eps of The Champions.
